title: Samsung is launching a Pokémon themed Galaxy Z Flip 3 in South Korea
content:
If you’re looking to pick up a foldable phone and are also a massive fan of Pokémon, then you might be in luck… if you live in South Korea. Samsung is launching a special Pokémon edition of the Galaxy Z Flip 3 in just a couple of days, though there’s no sign of it having

The post Samsung is launching a Pokémon themed Galaxy Z Flip 3 in South Korea appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung is launching a special Pokemon edition of the Galaxy Z Flip 3 in South Korea, and it looks like an interesting set for collectors.
